mapper.select: SELECT @num:=@num+1 as count, sprint_no as sprintNo, scrum_no as scrumNo, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate FROM sprint as a, (select @num := 0) as b where scrum_no = (select scrum_no from scrum where project_list_no = #{projectListNo}) order by sprint_no asc

SELECT sprint_back_log_no as sprintBackLogNo, sprint_no as sprintNo, user_story_no as userStoryNo, user_no as userNo, content, status, done_date as doneDate FROM sprint_back_log where sprint_no in (SELECT sprint_no FROM sprint where scrum_no = (select scrum_no from scrum where project_list_no = #{projectListNo}) order by sprint_no asc)
